titleStmt.title: The English physitian, or An astrologo-physical discourse of the vulgar herbs of this nation being a compleat method of physick, whereby a man may preserve his body in health, or cure himself being sick for three pence charge, with such things only as grow in England ... / by Nich. Culpeper.
titleStmt.author: Culpeper, Nicholas, 1616-1654.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
